specs.name:
Electronically-controlled Air Suspension (EAS) with
						Continuous Damping Control (CDC)

4-wheel Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) with Electronic
						Brake-force Distribution (EBD) and Brake Assist (BA)
Power 4-wheel disc brakes, front and rear ventilated

Vehicle Stability Management (VSM) system with pre-collision
						warning

4-wheel Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) with Electronic
						Brake-force Distribution (EBD) and Brake Assist (BA)

Nine airbags: Advanced dual front, front and rear
						seat-mounted side-impact airbags, driver's knee, and roof-mounted
						side-curtain airbags (SRS)
Smart Cruise Control (SCC) with stop/start functionality

Front and Rear Parking Assistance System with Rear
						Cross-traffic Alert (RCTA)
Electronic active front head restraints with power controls

Electronic Parking Brake (EPB) with Automatic Vehicle Hold
						(AVH)
Seatbelt tensioning system with haptic pre-collision warning

Dual power-folding heated auto-dimming side mirrors with
						approach lamps
Power tilt-and-slide sunroof with one-touch open

Acoustic laminated windshield and side windows; front door
						water-repellant glass
Hands-free smart trunk with auto open

Proximity Key (fob and card type) entry with push button
						start
Dual asymmetrical exhaust tips integrated with rear bumper

Premium leather seating surfaces and microfiber suede
						headliner
Power driver seat cushion extension and lumbar support
Rear-seat power up/down head restraints with manual tilt
Center armrest with dual cupholders and control console
Rear-seat entertainment system with dual 9.2-inch monitors

Three-zone automatic temperature control with Air Quality
						System (AQS)

SiriusXM Satellite Radio with Data Services including
						NavTraffic

Navigation system with 9.2-inch LCD screen with DIS
						Multimedia Controller
Electroluminescent Gauge Cluster with 7-inch TFT LCD screen
Full 12.3-inch TFT LCD instrument cluster display screen
Leather-wrapped heated steering wheel with wood trim

Steering-wheel-mounted controls (Smart Cruise Control (SCC),
						audio, Bluetooth
Power tilt-and-slide with one-touch open/close sunroof
Rear window defroster, electronic with timer

Integrated Memory System (IMS) (power driver seat, steering
						wheel, side mirrors)
Power windows with auto down/up with pinch protection
Proximity Key (fob and card type) entry with push button start
Auto-dimming inside rearview mirror with compass

Illuminated scuff plates, inside door handles and door
						armrests
Premium-grade floor mats and trunk cargo mat
